body:
Is it possible to create laminated glass with Sentryglas interlayers by using the EP Construction component? I've had a a lot of success creating IGU's so I'm hopeful I can make laminated glass without just plugging in values for the EP window material component. If it is possible, how would I create a material for the interlayer (as it is not an opaque material, glass material, or air gap)?



Thank you!

Aaron

replies.body:
Hi Aaron,

I don't know the answer to this question myself. Doing a quick search I found these two:

This paper suggests using simplified method ([http://gaia.lbl.gov/btech/papers/2804.pdf](http://gaia.lbl.gov/btech/papers/2804.pdf))

You can also use Window to generate the material data ([http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-0/input-output-reference/pa...](http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-0/input-output-reference/page-010.html))

My suggestion for you is to send your question to (unmethours.com).

-Mostapha
